bboxes.reason: The bounding box with index 0 correctly encompasses the 'Preset time/time' button's pressing area, which is the designated control element.

Bounding box 1 primarily encapsulates the pressing area of the Menu/Cancel button, which matches the described criteria. Bounding box 24 only includes part of the label and not the button's pressing area.
The bounding box with index 2 primarily encompasses the button labeled 'Start', capturing the pressing area relevant to the 'start_button' control element.
Bounding box 3 accurately encloses the entire digital display, meeting the criteria for identifying the 'digital_display' control element.
